1514318869_1DpN91N84piuzYn2iJKM9RK3Ek8JV.body: Quite interesting to see the different approaches to decentralise the web. I think some project will merge tech. I like ZeroNetwork because it is here and growing. Looks strong enough to stick around. Other projects like MaidSafe seem to be moving from vapourware to actually something usable, concrete, and well thought out. The next 2-3 years should flesh out what will be what I guess.

1514154784_19WW28sn46rz9h15xf6NCELPdzxZ2.body: If bitcoin becomes mainstream and corrupted, then the crowd will shift from bitcoin to that which is less corrupted or corruptible. If it continues to centralise, the crowd will either devalue it, and move, or change it to balance stakeholder interests. You see a thousand altcoins. Most are ponzi get rich quick attempts. Quite a few are testing grounds answering present and future problems around staying free and open.
